'Viktor OrbÃ¡n' (; born 31 May 1963) has been the Prime Minister of Hungary since
2010, a post he held from 1998 to 2002. OrbÃ¡n leads the FideszâHungarian Civic
Union party; in the 2010 elections, the party, together with the Christian
Democratic People's Party, won 52.73% of the votes and a two-thirds
supermajority of the seats in the parliament of Hungary.
